医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，互联网使用量的增加与青少年的焦虑程度增加有关2019 年冠状病毒病期间青少年焦虑和网络成瘾的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Increased-internet-use-linked-to-higher-anxiety-in-teens-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Increased-internet-use-linked-to-higher-anxiety-in-teens-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41562218-d3f2-42e5-966a-51dbe6da313a Mon, 11 Dec 2023 08:55:00 -0500 Increased internet use linked to higher anxiety in teens, research shows
肉类和鱼类的消费与非酒精性脂肪肝之间是否存在关联？肉类和鱼类消费与非酒精性脂肪肝 (NAFLD) 风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-meat-and-fish-conspiration-and-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-meat-and-fish-conspiration-and-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91e31598-cbe7-44a2-864e-93e3084c6f64 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 08:24:00 -0500 Is there an association between meat and fish consumption and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease?
DeepMirror 为其直观的分子药物设计软件启动早期访问计划创新产品使药物化学家能够访问和集成人工智能，以提高生产力和创造力，加速治疗药物的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/DeepMirror-launches-early-access-programme-for-its-intuitive-molecular-drug-design-software.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/DeepMirror-launches-early-access-programme-for-its-intuitive-molecular-drug-design-software.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cbf6a4b-f8ed-4742-a04e-dd43abfb8062 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 07:23:00 -0500 DeepMirror launches early access programme for its intuitive molecular drug design software
维生素补充对孕前至产后母亲维生素状态纵向模式的影响研究人员对 NiPPeR 随机临床试验 (RCT) 数据进行了二次分析，以评估孕前、孕期和产后母亲的维生素水平，并探讨了孕前和孕期补充维生素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/The-influence-of-vitamin-supplementation-on-longitudinal-patterns-of-maternal-vitamin-status-from-preconception-to-post-delivery。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/The-influence-of-vitamin-supplementation-on-longitudinal-patterns-of-maternal-vitamin-status-from-preconception-to-post-delivery。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db871993-d750-4665-afa7-8e8b9346cfb2 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:41:00 -0500 The influence of vitamin supplementation on longitudinal patterns of maternal vitamin status from preconception to post-delivery
研究表明以社区为基础的心理健康服务可以减少耻辱和不平等在图书馆、信仰机构和社区中心等社区环境中的共处一地如何影响心理健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-shows-community-based-mental-health-services-reduce-stigma-and-inequalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Study-shows-community-based-mental-health-services-reduce-stigma-and-inequalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2aa19d-8e59-4ad4-9180-b1e2297e5a84 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:38:00 -0500 Study shows community-based mental health services reduce stigma and inequalities
从生存到繁荣：艾滋病毒感染者长期成功的框架NewsMedical 采访了吉利德科学公司全球艾滋病毒医疗事务全球执行董事 Lisa Sterman，讨论了最近发布的 LTS 框架，该框架最近在第 19 届欧洲艾滋病会议开幕式上得到了强调，该框架采用以人为本的方法来进行艾滋病毒治疗之旅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/From-surviving-to-thriving-a-framework-for-long-term-success-in-people-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/From-surviving-to-thriving-a-framework-for-long-term-success-in-people-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9009c053-efda-40e7-abf0-ac149402abef Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:31:00 -0500 From surviving to thriving: a framework for long-term success in people with HIV
屏幕时间与自闭症谱系障碍之间是否存在关联？研究人员进行了一项荟萃分析，以调查屏幕使用与自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 之间的潜在关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-screen-time-and-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Is-there-an-association- Between-screen-time-and-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d0fee2-67c0-4b49-ba42-ae51f2e8de35 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:20:00 -0500 Is there an association between screen time and autism spectrum disorder?
平衡行为：研究表明，减少工作、增加社交生活是老年人幸福的关键针对 55 岁以上老年人的改进工作与生活平衡 (WLB) 概念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Balancing-act-Less-work-more-social-life-key-to-happiness-for-seniors-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Balancing-act-Less-work-more-social-life-key-to-happiness-for-seniors-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a182527-a9cd-4c80-a960-8effa37ed9bd Mon, 11 Dec 2023 06:03:00 -0500 Balancing act: Less work, more social life key to happiness for seniors, study shows

AIHW 数据显示澳大利亚公立医院接受择期手术的患者等待时间增加澳大利亚健康与福利研究所的数据显示，从2021-22年到2022-23年，澳大利亚公立医院接受择期（非紧急）手术的患者数量增加了18%，但许多患者仍面临漫长的等待时间（AIHW）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/AIHW-data-reveals-increase-in-waiting-times-for-病人-undergoing-elective-surgery-in-Australiae28099s-public-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/AIHW-data-reveals-increase-in-waiting-times-for-病人-undergoing-elective-surgery-in-Australiae28099s-public-hospitals.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=906f37a7-54ae-4ac3-a084-e9be5f78349a Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:21:00 -0500 AIHW data reveals increase in waiting times for patients undergoing elective surgery in Australia’s public hospitals
